DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of epinastine nasal spray compared to placebo for the treatment of subjects with seasonal allergic rhinitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Epinastine Nasal Spray in Subjects With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (P08648)
DOC.criteria: A documented history of seasonal allergic rhinitis to mountain cedar or other spring pollen Significant medical condition Significant nasal abnormality Significant cardiac condition Recent infection Use of other allergy medication during the study Use of asthma medication other than asneeded albuterol
